thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Roger Ewart Smith
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Roger Ewart Smith

author: Roger Ewart Smith
title: Roger Ewart Smith
text:
Travelling to a new country with only a limited idea of where to go, where to stay and what to do is a bit of a risk. Robin Sabine pulled together a fantastic package that absolutely met our brief and in terms of quality exceeded our expectations. It all worked smoothly with one hitch which was not Costa Rica vacations fault and they resolved this quickly and fairly.
Costa Rica is a wonderful place and Robin brought the best out of it for us.
